availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Solomon G. Street (Tippah County, Mississippi, farmer, soldier, and guerrilla)

body.p: Tippah County, Mississippi, farmer, soldier, and guerrilla. Tennessee native. Married to Rhoda P. Balch Street. Father of Jesse A. Street and M. A. Street. Farmer in Tippah County in 1860. Sergeant in the 2nd Mississippi Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) from 1861 to 1862. Captain in the 2nd Mississippi State Cavalry (C.S.A.) from 1862 to 1863. Major in the 15th (Consolidated) Tennessee Cavalry (Streetâ€™s Battalion) (C.S.A.) in 1864.
